title: ‘Unstoppable until they aren’t’: are tech market losses signs of a bust? - The Guardian
content:
1. ‘Unstoppable until they aren’t’: are tech market losses signs of a bust?  The Guardian

description: Apple is no longer the most valuable company, Meta took a $230bn hit, Amazon reported its first loss since 2015, but a slump ‘is a big question mark’
